name: Infernal Knight
description: The Infernal Knight is a tall fiend clad in dark plate armor, wielding a greatsword adorned with runes that hint at its necrotic powers. Its presence exudes an aura of chaos and menace on the battlefield.
memorable: The ability to capture souls and regenerate health makes it a substantial threat, allowing it to weaken foes and prolong its life in combat.
goals: To hunt down its quarry, serve its lord, and dominate the battlefield through fear and power.
relations: Likely serves other powerful fiends or dark lords, and may encounter other fiends or adventurers drawn to its malicious nature.
environment: Often found in dark, infernal realms or on battlefields where evil forces clash.
strengths: High hit points, magical attacks, regeneration, and strong resistance to various damage types.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity, which may hinder its mobility or evade attacks.
attacks: Utilizes a magical greatsword that deals slashing and necrotic damage, as well as a ranged Hellfire Bolt attack combining fire and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Reave Soul ability allows it to execute foes with 0 hit points and capture their souls for healing and power.
senses: Possesses truesight out to 60 feet and a passive perception of 20, allowing it to detect hidden or invisible foes.
skills: Skilled in Athletics, Insight, and Perception, providing it with advantages in physical challenges and awareness.
additional_information: Immune to fire, necrotic, and poison damage.
Resistant to cold and non-magical physical damage.
Can regenerate health at the start of each turn.
Has advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Can create a portal to other planes with Planar Rift ability.
test_queries: fiend that captures souls and regenerates
relentless fiend that flies and hunts
lawful evil fiend from other planes
